/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky above. A black car is seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape.
